title: Bill signed into law | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




August 07, 2009

 



Bill signed into law




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                         August 7, 2009 On Friday, August 7, 2009, the President signed into law:   H.R. 3357, which provides funding to cover expected shortfalls of the Highway Trust Fund and the Unemployment Trust Fund and increases the loan guarantee authority of the Federal Housing Administration and Government National Mortgage Association.
